actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To establish the Northern Plains National Heritage Area in the State of North Dakota.
short_title: Northern Plains National Heritage Area Act

summary.text: Northern Plains Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Northern Plains National Heritage Area in North Dakota. Designates the Northern Plains Heritage Foundation as the local coordinating entity for the Area. Directs the Foundation to submit a management plan for the Area.

titles.title: Northern Plains National Heritage Area Act
To establish the Northern Plains National Heritage Area in the State of North Dakota.
